articles.title: New Hampshire’s $90 million hotel is finally open. Is the Lake Estate on Winnisquam five-star material?
articles.description:
TILTON, N.H. — It’s easy to be cynical about a project like the Lake Estate on Winnisquam. It’s a giant, luxury resort built in a section of New Hampshire where there are no other posh hotel offerings. Its managers brazenly stated they wanted the property to rank on the Forbes Travel Guide months before it […]

The post New Hampshire’s $90 million hotel is finally open. Is the Lake Estate on Winnisquam five-star material? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: New Hampshire’s $90 million hotel is finally open.
